Nighlight:

Nightlight didn't a movement, she felt safe and happy while Rodimus 
huged her, the war and troubles seemed to be far of their lives, but 
she knew that that magic moment would be brake soon. She knew that 
maximals needed him, by a second she wished that Rodimus and she 
would be far of that war.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus had the same reaction as Nightlight. Everything was blocked 
out, the Maximals, the trouble in the CR room, the whole war. Right 
now the whole universe, as far as he was concerned, was Nightlight 
and him. He holds her close, not letting go, as he continues to kiss 
her.
